input.sentences: the ocean has been dissipating off the coast for years now .
from it we got a lot more beach .
enough beach to actually walk on . this used to be all water .
the fence used to indicate deep water but now just looks like a normal fence .
you could even see boats once sunken on the shore .
output.sentences: It was a beautiful day for a trip to the beach.
The tide was low and the waves were calm.
There were hardly any people on the beach at all.
A fence had been erected to help people know where the coastline was.
And boats were behind the fence.
